Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades were associated with Hrithik Roshan in the movie 'Vikram Vedha' (2022)?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Actor at the 68th Filmfare Awards
B. Won Best Actor at the 68th Filmfare Awards
C. Nominated for Best Supporting Actor at the 68th Filmfare Awards
D. Nominated for Best Actor at the 2023 National Film Awards
Correct Answer: Nominated for Best Actor at the 68th Filmfare Awards

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades were associated with the movie 'Vikram Vedha' released in 2022?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Dialogue at the 68th Filmfare Awards
B. Won Best Director at the 68th Filmfare Awards
C. Nominated for Best Actor at the 68th Filmfare Awards
D. Writers Manoj Muntashir and B. A. Fida were involved in the screenplay
Correct Answer: Nominated for Best Dialogue at the 68th Filmfare Awards, Writers Manoj Muntashir and B. A. Fida were involved in the screenplay

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades are associated with the movie 'Vikram Vedha' (2022)?
Options:
A. Best Background Score nomination at the 68th Filmfare Awards
B. Best Director nomination at the 68th Filmfare Awards
C. Best Actor nomination at the 68th Filmfare Awards
D. Best Film nomination at the 68th Filmfare Awards
Correct Answer: Best Background Score nomination at the 68th Filmfare Awards

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades are associated with the movie 'Vikram Vedha' (2022)?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Cinematography at the 68th Filmfare Awards
B. Won Best Director at the 68th Filmfare Awards
C. P. S. Vinod was the cinematographer for the film
D. Nominated for Best Film at the 68th Filmfare Awards
Correct Answer: Nominated for Best Cinematography at the 68th Filmfare Awards, P. S. Vinod was the cinematographer for the film

Question & Options:
Which accolades did the movie 'Vikram Vedha' (2022) receive related to production design?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Production Design at the 68th Filmfare Awards
B. Won Best Art Direction at the National Film Awards
C. Nominated for Best Cinematography at the Filmfare Awards

Correct Answer: Nominated for Best Production Design at the 68th Filmfare Awards, Nominated for Best Production Design at the 68th Filmfare Awards
